item.description:
For September's meeting, Armand Dufresne from Gale Assoc will be there to discuss the upcoming plans and changes to KFIT with us. Along with, hopefully, a few commissioners...
He will be bringing plans and a tripod. Please bring your questions as this is a meeting we've been working on for a long time...

We'll also be going over the Wings and Wheels event coming up on October. Please distribute the flyers that were sent out.

Also going over the Young Eagles event on October 16th.

We need to discuss our Christmas party as well. Last year we decided to stay at the place in Leominster again.




As always, Fly Often and Fly Safe.
See you all soon.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

As always, food at 6:00 and meeting at 7:00.

Where else can you have this much excitement for $25 bucks a year?

Fly Often and Fly Safe,
Charley

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association EAA Chapter 1454 Monthly Meetup
